generated_description: pingyao jiaxin guesthouse is a 2-star accommodation located in pingyao, china. situated 1.4 miles from lei lutai residence, the guesthouse features wi-fi throughout the property and a nearby car park. the guesthouse offers 18 rooms, each equipped with soundproof windows, flat-screen tvs with satellite channels, and private bathrooms with bath sheets and towels. guests can enjoy a breakfast served in the restaurant. the property also provides a sundeck and a summer terrace for an additional charge. the guesthouse is conveniently located near the pingyao ancient city railway station and is a short walk from the huiwulin traditional wushu gallery and rishengchang former bank.
